spaceinvaders.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.command.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeScoreCommand, ConfigurePlayerCommand, FlushScreenCommand, GameOverCommand, MoveEntityCommand, MovePlayerLeftCommand, MovePlayerRightCommand, PlayerShootCommand, PlayersLostCommand, PlayersWonCommand, QuitGameCommand, RefreshEntitiesCommand, SetPlayerIdCommand, SetPlayerNamesCommand, SpawnEntityCommand, StartGameCommand, TranslateGroupCommand, WipeOutEntityCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    Command to be executed on the client or the server side.

    Commands are sent over the network, and are serialized using the json format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Command(java.lang.String name, ProtocolEnum protocol)
      In case the game in not played in LAN, only TCP will be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        protected Command(java.lang.String name,
                  ProtocolEnum protocol)
        In case the game in not played in LAN, only TCP will be used.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command, used for identification (usually the name of the class).
        protocol - specifies the internet protocol used to send the command.
